sentences.en: AT - 1420 significantly inhibited tne incorporation of 3 H - TdR into EAC cells.
sentences.cn: 另口服和注射给药均有效.AT -1420 对~3H-TdR参入EAC细胞中有明显的抑制作用,抑制率为70%(±8.1).

sentences.en: Brd U incorporation reduced by 54.2 % ( P < 0. 05 ).
CFU - GM and ~3 H - TdR incorporation did not change obviously but BMC decreased significantly.
sentences.cn: 对CFU-GM 、H~3-TdR掺入无明显改变,但骨髓有核细胞计数显著性降低.

sentences.en: Colonization of a calcareous stripmine spoil by earthworms promoted incorporation of organic matter.
sentences.cn: 在石灰质露天矿引入蚯蚓,则促进有机物的结合.

sentences.en: Difficulties exist in the incorporation of the thermodynamic specifications.
sentences.cn: 在与热动力学的结合上存在困难.

sentences.en: Especially many new cities are appeared largely by incorporation.
sentences.cn: 而由兼并整合形成的新兴城市更是大量产生.

sentences.en: If the index is not equal, direct incorporation of llist 2 China.
sentences.cn: 如果指数不相等的, 就直接归并到llist2中.

sentences.en: More consistent incorporation of Job Safety Analysis and Post - Dive Safety Assessments.
sentences.cn: 工作安全分析和潜水后安全评估的进一步统一.

sentences.en: Others are more suited to incorporation within a pure CSS layout.
sentences.cn: 另外一些完美的CSS效果更适合于公司企业.

sentences.en: Please always use this form for incorporation in Deleware.
sentences.cn: 涉及在特拉华州成立的公司,请遵照以上格式填写.

sentences.en: Such simplified radiation calculations are required for incorporation into numerical models.
sentences.cn: 为了编入数值模式,这个简化的辐射计算是很需要的.

sentences.en: The Corporations Law provides for the registration and incorporation of companies.
sentences.cn: 公司法规定了注册及公司的组建.

sentences.en: The incorporation of air bubbles in the glass spoiled it.
sentences.cn: 玻璃含有气泡,使它质量降低.

sentences.en: These three hormones also robustly stimulated thymidine incorporation and inhibited drug - induced apoptosis.
sentences.cn: 并且这三种激素有利于胸(腺嘧啶脱氧核)苷掺入和抑制药物诱导的细胞凋亡.

sentences.en: VNP could decrease 3 H ~ TdR incorporation in CFs in a concentration - dependent manner.
sentences.cn: 低氧使CFS’ H- TdR掺 入水平显著增高,VNP可显著降低低氧时’H - TdR的掺入水平,而且有剂量依赖性.
